org.jruyi.common.BytesBuilder

  • Packages that use BytesBuilder 
    Package Description
    org.jruyi.common
    JRuyi Common Package Version 1.1

    • Uses of BytesBuilder in org.jruyi.common

      Methods in org.jruyi.common that return BytesBuilder 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      BytesBuilder BytesBuilder.append(byte b)
      Appends the given byte b into this BytesBuilder.
      BytesBuilder BytesBuilder.append(byte[] bytes)
      Appends the data in the given bytes into this BytesBuilder .
      BytesBuilder BytesBuilder.append(byte[] bytes, int offset, int length)
      Appends length bytes of the given bytes starting at offset into this BytesBuilder.
      BytesBuilder BytesBuilder.append(char[] chars)
      Appends the bytes, encoded from the given chars using the platform's default charset, into this BytesBuilder.
      BytesBuilder BytesBuilder.append(char[] chars, Charset charset)
      Appends the bytes, encoded from the given chars using the given charset, into this BytesBuilder.

      Appends the bytes, encoded from the given chars using the specified charset codec, into this BytesBuilder.
      BytesBuilder BytesBuilder.append(char[] chars, int offset, int length)
      Appends the bytes, encoded from the given chars starting at offset ending at (offset + length) using the platform's default charset, into this BytesBuilder.

      Appends the bytes, encoded from the given chars starting at offset ending at (offset + length) using the specified charset, into this BytesBuilder.
